"National Museum of Poland" bụ aha a na-akpọkarị ọtụtụ n'ime ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie kachasị ukwuu na nke a ma ama na mba ahụ
Ụlọ ihe ngosi nka nke Poland nwere ọtụtụ alaka nwere onwe ha, nke ọ bụla na-arụ ọrụ ọtụtụ obere ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie

Isi alaka bụ National Museum na Kraków (Polish: ), nke e guzobere n'afọ 1879 na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide nke nwere ọtụtụ narị puku ihe - nke e debere na nnukwu akụkụ na Main Building (n'akụkụ 3 Maja St.), kamakwa na asatọ nke ngalaba ya gburugburu obodo ahụ.

N'etiti ọtụtụ ụlọ ngosi nka  nke mba  Poland gburugburu ụwa, e nwekwara Polish Museum of America na Chicago, Polish American Museum na New York City na Polish National Museum na Rapperswil, Switzerland.
